transArray.content: Warm water, fruits, and snacks are provided at the front desk. The service is good. Because of the decoration, there is a full-time guide, who also helps to carry the suitcase. After ordering takeout, he also helps to pick up the takeout outside.

A word of praise is enough to make us feel grateful. Only by continuing to work hard can we live up to our expectations. Thank you, guest, for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for recognizing our service attitude. Your support is the greatest encouragement for our work. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable stay experience. All hotel staff look forward to your visit. I wish you all the best every time you visit!
